data.title: Job Opportunities – Teamsters Union Local 25
data.text:
. In July 2024, on the working mirror of the Vavada (Вавада зеркало) casino, we will publish a review of health programs from Teamsters and proposals for integrating such programs into the Vavada online casino. See our partners website. .

All Teamsters members receive online casino bonuses in the form of freespins (фриспины) for their active participation in the union. Follow the link and select your bonus.

Job Opportunities

EAST BOSTON NEIGHBORHOOD HEALTH CENTER (EBNHC)

10 Gove Street

East Boston, MA 02128

Transportation Associate (Driver)

Monday-Friday 8am – 4pm

$22.22/hr with overtime available

Sign on bonus

Company medical, dental, 401K with company match, tuition reimbursement

Generous earned time package with 2 weeks of vacation accumulated within the first year of employment; 3 weeks during the 2ndyear; 4 weeks’ vacation during the third year.

Must have great communication skills, the ability to work independently and to make common sense decisions with a frail elderly population.

Qualifications: HS Diploma/GED, MA Class D driver’s license, excellent driving record

Van driving and/or personal care experience highly desirable.

Must successfully pass a Department of Transportation approved medical examination prior to hire date.

Bilingual candidates encouraged to apply.

Apply online: Contact Jim O’Brien – Transportation Manager: 617-568-7299 or email: obrienj@ebnhc.org

ARMSTRONG AMBULANCE SERVICE

87 Mystic Street

Arlington MA 02474

Positions are based at one of our 7 locations:

Arlington/Woburn/Medford/Saugus/Waltham/Brighton/Stoneham

* All include Teamster healthcare benefits, 401k with a 4% company match for all eligible employees

Emergency First Responder:

Drives an ambulance and works with a licensed EMT to transport patients. Excellent opportunity for drivers interested in healthcare

Must have valid driver’s license and provide an acceptable driving record, excellent customer service skills, and a satisfactory background check

Full time and part time available

Overtime available if desired

Flexible scheduling, with weekday and weekend shifts available in Arlington, Woburn, Brighton, and Stoneham

Starting pay $19-24/hr depending on experience

Paid training provided (CPR certification and Emergency Medical Responder certification)

Chair Car Driver:

Drives a chair car to provide transportation to individuals in wheelchairs between facilities/home. Excellent opportunity for drivers with an interest in healthcare

Must have valid driver’s license and provide an acceptable driving record, excellent customer service skills, a satisfactory background check

Full time and part time available

Overtime available if desired

Weekday shifts available in Arlington, Woburn and Brighton

Starting pay $19-24/hr. depending on experience

Paid training provided

Emergency Medical Technician (EMT):

Administers basic life support to sick and injured persons in a pre-hospital setting

Must be certified as an Emergency Medical Technician in Massachusetts and have a valid motor vehicle operator license with satisfactory driving history.

Interfacility Transfer (IFT), 911, and detail shifts available

Full time and part time available

Overtime available if desired

Flexible scheduling, with weekday and weekend shifts available in Arlington, Woburn, Brighton, Stoneham, Medford, Saugus, and Waltham

Starting pay $22-27/hr depending on experience

Paramedic:

Administers basic and advanced life support to sick and injured persons in a pre-hospital setting.

Must be certified as a Paramedic in Massachusetts

Interfacility Transfer (IFT), 911, and detail shifts available

Full time, part time, and per diem positions available

Overtime available if desired

Flexible scheduling, with weekday and weekend shifts available in Arlington, Woburn, Medford, Saugus, and Waltham

Starting pay $26-$33/hr depending on experience

Apply now: www.armstrongambulance.com/careers

Contact Bethany Bellingham for more information: bbellingham@armstrongambulance.com

MASSACHUSETTS CONVENTION CENTER

415 Summer Street

Boston, MA 02210

Hiring: Public Safety Supervisor

Starting rate is $25.82/HOUR

The MCCA Public Safety Supervisor will ensure that all officers under his / her supervision are provided with the training, equipment and information necessary to complete their job functions in an effective, efficient and safe manner.

Qualifications:

Associates and a minimum of two years’ experience in police and/or security operations, with at least one of those years at the supervisory level demonstrating direct responsibility for an organization’s public safety and security operations.

Significant years of Public Safety related operations experience and training may substitute for the degree requirement.

Demonstrated knowledge of security, property management, operations, law enforcement policies and investigative procedures are essential.

Requires familiarity with electronic surveillance equipment; relational database management systems; fire suppression and detection systems; intrusion alarm systems; access control systems; and a working knowledge of state-of-the-art word processing and computer related analytical tools and databases, such as Microsoft Word, Excel and Access.

Must possess a valid US Driver’s License and be able to operate a motor vehicle in the State of Massachusetts.

It is preferable that the incumbent be CPR and First Aid certified.

Apply online:

https://workforcenow.adp.com/mascsr/default/mdf/recruitment/recruitment.html?cid=b24dd43e-0d64-44ab-ba20 3f8e7cf60be&ccId=19000101_000001&jobId=508501&source=CC2&lang=en_US

ASE Certifications

Apply online: https://goodyear.greatjob.net/

Qualifications:

ASE Certification

Previous electrical, air conditioning

Apply online: https://goodyear.greatjob.net/
